TypeSignature.Value: public ref class SimplificationOptions abstract sealed
.class public auto ansi abstract sealed beforefieldinit SimplificationOptions extends System.Object

Docs.summary: Contains the options that needs to be drilled down to the Simplification Engine

MemberSignature.Value: Public Shared ReadOnly Property AllowSimplificationToBaseType As Option(Of Boolean)

Docs.summary: This option says if we should simplify from Derived types to Base types in Static Member Accesses

MemberSignature.Value: Public Shared ReadOnly Property AllowSimplificationToGenericType As Option(Of Boolean)

Docs.summary: This option says if we should simplify to NonGeneric Name rather than GenericName

MemberSignature.Value: Public Shared ReadOnly Property PreferAliasToQualification As Option(Of Boolean)

Docs.summary: This option tells the simplification engine if the Qualified Name should be replaced by Alias if the user had initially not used the Alias

MemberSignature.Value: Public Shared ReadOnly Property PreferImplicitTypeInference As Option(Of Boolean)

Docs.summary: This option says that if we should simplify the Generic Name which has the type argument inferred

MemberSignature.Value: Public Shared ReadOnly Property PreferImplicitTypeInLocalDeclaration As Option(Of Boolean)

Docs.summary: This option says if we should simplify the Explicit Type in Local Declarations

MemberSignature.Value: Public Shared ReadOnly Property PreferIntrinsicPredefinedTypeKeywordInDeclaration As PerLanguageOption(Of Boolean)

Docs.summary: This option says if we should prefer keyword for Intrinsic Predefined Types in Declarations

MemberSignature.Value: Public Shared ReadOnly Property PreferIntrinsicPredefinedTypeKeywordInMemberAccess As PerLanguageOption(Of Boolean)

Docs.summary: This option says if we should prefer keyword for Intrinsic Predefined Types in Member Access Expression

MemberSignature.Value: Public Shared ReadOnly Property PreferOmittingModuleNamesInQualification As Option(Of Boolean)

Docs.summary: This option influences the name reduction of members of a module in VB. If set to true, the name reducer will e.g. reduce Namespace.Module.Member to Namespace.Member.

MemberSignature.Value: Public Shared ReadOnly Property QualifyEventAccess As PerLanguageOption(Of Boolean)

Docs.summary: This option says if we should simplify away the . or . in event access expressions.

MemberSignature.Value: Public Shared ReadOnly Property QualifyFieldAccess As PerLanguageOption(Of Boolean)

Docs.summary: This option says if we should simplify away the . or . in field access expressions.

MemberSignature.Value: Public Shared ReadOnly Property QualifyMemberAccessWithThisOrMe As PerLanguageOption(Of Boolean)

Docs.summary: This option says if we should simplify away the or in member access expressions.

MemberSignature.Value: Public Shared ReadOnly Property QualifyMethodAccess As PerLanguageOption(Of Boolean)

Docs.summary: This option says if we should simplify away the . or . in method access expressions.

MemberSignature.Value: Public Shared ReadOnly Property QualifyPropertyAccess As PerLanguageOption(Of Boolean)

Docs.summary: This option says if we should simplify away the . or . in property access expressions.
